column5: Hey all,  I am looking for recommendations for places to stay in Terrace Bay area.  Reasons why you like your recommendation, when you last stayed there.  Any and all suggestions will be greatly appreciated !  BOB

The Red Dog Inn is probably the best, the Imperial being second. I have stayed in both and had no issues with either, but that was 20 years ago.  http://www.reddoginn.ca/default.asp  Drifters Roadhouse Imperial Inn does not seem to have a website, just an e-mail address.  http://www.lakesuperiorcircletour.info/lodging/terrace_bay.html
